page.title: 18 Improvements to Wootton.
page.content: Even though we have a play school in Wootton, many people would like a nursery school as well. The primary school itself is in poor condition and needs replacing or improving. We do have a playground and recreation ground but many children do not have enough to do when they come home from school. More local medical care is needed for children and old people and old people also have difficulty getting on and off the buses. They need some good bus shelters where they can sit down. The church needs repairs doing to the tower and the roads are in a bad state and dangerous in some places. Although some houses are being built, most people do not want the village to get any bigger.
